title: Jobs
description: Jobs are the core part of task and time tracking. Assign tasks to staff, tick them off as completed, generate invoices.

topics.title: Change the number of decimal places in Job task quantities (Advanced)
How to save Jobs/Projects/Tasks as a template for future use
How to create a Job deposit

config.job_send_staff_task_email_automatically: If you change this from 0 to 1 then all new job tasks created will be automatically emailed to the assigned staff member. This is similar to manually clicking the Email Staff button from the Job page.
config.long_description_wysiwyg: Set this to 1 to enable WYSIWYG editor on job task description. Set it to 0 to leave it as plain text.
